ARABIC: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This truly is a Reminder, so whoever wills should take the Way towards his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This surely is a reminder: Therefore whosoever desires may take the way to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily this is an Exhortation; so let him who so will take a way to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This chapter is a reminder. Let those who want, seek guidance from their Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is indeed an advice; so whoever wishes may take the path towards his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this is an admonition, so whosoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely this is a reminder, so whoever pleases takes to his Lord a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely this is a Reminder; so he who will, takes unto his Lord a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! this is an Admonishment, that whosoever will may choose a way unto his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is a reminder. Let whoever wishes, take the right path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this is an admonition; then whosoever Will, may choose a way Unto his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is indeed a reminder. So let anyone who wishes take the way toward his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is an admonition: Whosoever will, let him take a (straight) Path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! This (Verses of the Quran) is an admonition, so whosoever wills, let him take a Path to his Lord (Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is indeed a Reminder, so that he who will, takes a path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is a reminder; so whoever wills, let him take a path to his Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:29] This, sūra, is indeed a reminder, an admonition for [all] creatures. Let him who will, then, choose a way to his Lord, a path, through obedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! this is an Admonishment) from Allah, (that whosoever will may choose a way unto his Lord) that whoever will may believe in Allah's divine Oneness and return to his Lord.
